Articles.Content: Just curious, does anyone else notice that the BIG-455 name kinda looks like (big ass)?
Thats kind of a joke in the game, in the kerbal config files there is a line that says BADA55: True that gives them an orange suit or something like that
It's also like the color code for the kerbal's skin. (#B4D455)

> 
> Just curious, does anyone else notice that the BIG-455 name kinda looks like (big ass)?

Don't forget Shuttle-esque Big-S wing part...
It used to be called BIG-A55 but they changed it in the 1.0.2 update.
